ygData.subject: Re: Best 1h blunt weapon...
ygData.msgSnippet: The Screaming Mace quest is in Crushbone. You could do the quest at about level 15 in a group. YOu need to get the tunic from Emporer Crush and the bracer off
ygData.messageBody:
The Screaming Mace quest is in Crushbone. You could
do the quest at about level 15 in a group. YOu need to
get the tunic from Emporer Crush and the bracer off of
the Orc Warlord. The quest info is available on some
EQ sites.

There is also a pretty good one off a named mummy and
one off a mob in Permafrost.

Belgarth

--- Omeg Felligan <omeg_felligan@...> wrote:
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> Have you tried the Screaming Mace? I think it's a
> quest in Cazic Thul
> <--yeah I can't spell) that's abuot lvl 35ish. So,
> if you ahve a friend, or
> care to buy one. it's 8 DMG 35 Delay (if I remember
> correctly) and casts
> Yeulp (again can't spell) randomly on you.
>
> That's the best one I know of, but there's probably
> better cause otherwise
> you'd use the same weapon from lvl 35-50 and that'd
> suck.
>
